objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#f8f8f8;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#f0f0f0;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FF5722;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF9800;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#e0e0e0' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#f0f0f0' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M0,300 C250,250, 500,350, 750,300 C1000,250, 1250,350, 1500,300 L1500,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M0,800 C250,850, 500,750, 750,800 C1000,850, 1250,750, 1500,800 L1500,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M40,140 L1040,140' stroke='#FF5722' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M40,940 L1040,940' stroke='#FF5722' stroke-width='4' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='#FF5722' opacity='0.03'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#FF5722' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Mid to Long-Distance Running Performance
• ENERGYRODS 2.0 Propulsive Technology
• LIGHTSTRIKE PRO Ultra-Light Cushioning
• Continental Rubber Outsole Durability

product_details.description: The Boston Marathon is a race. But it's also a goal, and a training plan and all the days it stays on your mind before the big one. The Adizero Boston 12 Shoes are built for mid- to long-distance running. They bring a race-day feel to training with a propulsive feel that comes from the glass-fiber infused ENERGYRODS 2.0, which limit energy loss underfoot. They're fast, but that does not come at the cost of durability - the midsole layers ultra-light LIGHTSTRIKE PRO cushioning with a new version of durable LIGHTSTRIKE 2.0 EVA. Continental Rubber outsole ENERGYRODS 2.0 limit energy loss Imported Sole material - Rubber ** Closure type - Lace-Up **

banner_details:
This banner features a dynamic and modern layout designed to highlight an athletic product. The primary heading (**heading**) uses a sci-fi styled font in dark gray, positioned at the top for high visibility. Beneath it, the subheading (**subheading**) is bold and orange, drawing attention to the product name. A thin underline (**decorative**) in warm amber adds subtle design emphasis. The feature list (**description**) is succinct and bullet-pointed in a dark gray font, neatly placed to the left of the central focus - a high-resolution product image (**product_image**) floating on soft, curved abstract background shapes. The price (**price**) stands out in bold type, placed at the bottom left. A prominent call-to-action button with a vivid orange background and white text (**cta_background** and **cta**) encourages conversion. The overall theme is framed by minimalist borders and subtle gradients.

**Color Palette**:
- White: `#ffffff`
- Charcoal Gray: `#212121`
- Medium Gray: `#424242`
- Vivid Orange: `#FF5722`
- Warm Amber: `#FF9800`
- Light Gray (background gradient): `#f8f8f8` to `#f0f0f0`
product_color: The product image showcases a dynamic color palette optimized for performance and energy. The base is a soft beige/off-white (#E6E2D2), providing a neutral backdrop. Bold black (#1C1C1C) is used for the iconic Adidas stripes, creating strong contrast and brand recognition. Vibrant gradients of orange (#FF5A1F), red-orange (#FF3C38), and yellow (#FFD447) energize the design along the midsole and heel, symbolizing speed and motion. A splash of salmon coral (#FF6F61) accents the lace-line, enhancing visual flow. Colors are blended through smooth transitions, especially in the heel area, making them vivid yet harmonious. This palette is ideal for a striking, energetic advertisement banner.
